nodes.text: The C fire team was a New Republic starfighter unit that fought during the Galactic Civil War.

C fire team fought in the Battle of Calamari in 10 ABY. The unit was devastated by the onslaught of the World Devastators. Their known actions included attempting to take out Devastators by attacking their towers. Towards the end of the battle, all known air support units had been wiped out by Imperial forces, including C fire team.
